subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर को किस ने शैली की ?
explanation_en: Vijay Singh, also known as Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II, established the city of Jaipur. He was the founder of the Jaipur State and the Jaipur City.
